showcase.title: Beautiful Themes for Every Workflow
showcase.subtitle: Choose from 9 professionally designed themes with light and dark modes. Each theme is crafted for readability, accessibility, and visual appeal.

design.title: Thoughtful Design
design.description: Carefully crafted color palettes and typography for optimal readability.

accessibility.title: WCAG Compliant
accessibility.description: All themes meet AA accessibility standards for contrast and readability.

ai.title: AI-Enhanced
ai.description: Smart theme suggestions based on your content and preferences.

modern.title: Modern
modern.description: Clean gradients and smooth shadows for a contemporary feel.

classic.title: Classic
classic.description: Professional navy and gold accents with traditional elegance.

paper.title: Paper
paper.description: Document-like aesthetic inspired by print design.

aurora.title: Aurora
aurora.description: Northern lights-inspired gradients with ethereal colors.

ocean.title: Ocean
ocean.description: Calming blues and teals reminiscent of deep waters.

forest.title: Forest
forest.description: Natural greens and earth tones for a grounded feel.

space.title: Space
space.description: Deep purples and cosmic accents for stargazers.

cyberpunk.title: Cyberpunk
cyberpunk.description: Neon accents and glowing effects for a futuristic vibe.

pricing.title: Free Forever. No Trials. No Tricks.
pricing.subtitle: Community Edition works offline forever at no cost. Upgrade to cloud for team collaboration or self-host with our enterprise license.

community.name: Community Edition
community.description: Community Edition - Works offline, always free.

lowLatency.title: Low Latency
lowLatency.description: Sub-50ms response times for all API endpoints.

scalable.title: Infinitely Scalable
scalable.description: From single user to enterprise teams without architecture changes.
scalable.descriptionOffline: Local-first architecture scales with your data.

ai.title: AI-Powered
ai.description: Intelligent suggestions and automations across your workflow.
ai.descriptionOffline: BYOK AI integration for offline intelligence.

cta.title: Transform Your Knowledge Today
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of teams using OpenStrand to weave their knowledge into actionable insights.

testimonials.title: Real Stories, Real Impact
testimonials.subtitle: See how teams are transforming their data into living knowledge.

items.quote: OpenStrand weaves together 10 years of research papers into an interconnected knowledge graph. The spaced repetition feature helps our students retain complex concepts 85% better.
items.name: Dr. James Park

items.quote: The recursive strand system finally lets us model our complex product taxonomy without compromises. Approval workflows keep everything audit-ready.
items.name: Sarah Chen

items.quote: We moved from three different tools to just OpenStrand. The offline-first approach means our field teams never lose work.
items.name: Marcus Johnson

hero.headline: Offline-First AI Knowledge OS with <highlight>REST API & TypeScript SDK</highlight>
hero.subheadline: Build knowledge graphs that work everywhere—browser, desktop, mobile. Auto-generated REST API, offline sync, and enterprise RBAC. Free forever. Works offline. No credit card.
hero.explore: Prefer exploring first? <repo>Star the repo</repo> or browse the <docs>docs</docs>.

hierarchies.title: Recursive strand hierarchies
hierarchies.description: Scope-safe DAGs with reusable parents per collection.

approvals.title: Auditable approvals
approvals.description: Request, review, and log every structural change.

offline.title: Offline-first with auto-sync
offline.description: Works in browser, desktop, mobile. Syncs when online.

api.title: Auto-generated REST API
api.description: Every user gets a personal API key. Full SDK included.

sdk.title: TypeScript SDK
sdk.description: Type-safe client for Node.js and browsers. npm install @framers/openstrand-sdk

nlp.title: Natural Language Processing
nlp.description: Use AI to understand and process natural language queries.

features.title: Everything You Need to <highlight>Weave Knowledge</highlight>
features.subtitle: Transform fragmented datasets into clear visual narratives with accessibility, privacy, and multilingual support baked in.

assistant.title: OS (Weaver): Your contextual coach
assistant.description: A calm, coachy assistant that understands your weaves/looms and recent work. It chats in natural language, nudges via the feed with daily check-ins, and suggests goals or organizing steps when it helps.

hierarchies.title: Recursive strand hierarchies
hierarchies.description: Model multi-scope DAGs with single parents per scope and reusable descendants across programs.

approvals.title: Approval workbench
approvals.description: Queue, review, and resolve structure requests with full audit trails and webhook hooks.

ai.title: AI-assisted modelling
ai.description: Intelligence proposes placements, placeholder copy, and conflict prevention before teams review.

typescript.title: End-to-end TypeScript
typescript.description: Shared schema types across Prisma, Fastify, Next.js, and the SDK keep approvals type-safe.

dedupe.title: Smart dedupe overrides
dedupe.description: Content hashes block accidental duplicates while editors intentionally clone with audit logs.

offline.title: Offline-first + cloud ready
offline.description: PGlite locally, PostgreSQL in production. Cascades behave identically in both.

placeholders.title: Placeholder policy engine
placeholders.description: Visibility caches compute who sees real content vs placeholders per scope and audience.

api.title: Structure request APIs
api.description: Submit, list, and resolve structure requests from the app, SDK, or automation workflows.

pipeline.title: AI suggestion pipeline
pipeline.description: Heuristics and models propose new parents, replacements, and placeholder copy.

telemetry.title: Audit-ready telemetry
telemetry.description: Visibility cascades emit metrics and logs for dashboards, alerts, and compliance exports.

plugins.title: Extensible Plugin System
plugins.description: Extend the UI, add commands, and integrate custom workflows with the plugin API.

cta.note: Community Edition • Free Forever • No Credit Card • Works Offline
